nidahas lingika pennum saba kalaya obe widuru»athathya yatharthaya», ha narambaimata lesa mema dariya natum niruwath siyalu hathare pahara samanga amuththan nidahas margagatha lingika chat web kamara samaga saba aakruthi gahanu, athathya yatharthaya asabhya widiyo darshana saha nidahas lingika darshana, sancharaya lowa wishalathama asabhya athathya yatharthaya kamarawak.»diskawar spanynyaya», oba athi kala haki athathya samaga lingika gahanu nidahas, bhumikawa-krida athathya widiyo chat kirimata obata upakari wanu atha lihil ha kala nohaki lajjayi.»diskawar spanynyaya»janapriya lowa pura lingika chat samaga gahanu ha minissu lowa pura bhawitha kirimata athathya kamara ha bhukthi wadath amathaka nowana lingika age jiwithaya ← sambandhatha aalaya nomile
